bibl.title: Supplementum Magicum. Vol. I.
bibl.note: Supplement to P.G.M. - Protective Charms, Pagan (1-19), Christian (20-36). - Erotic Charms (37-51). - The texts have all been published previously. Except for Latin 36, they are Greek.
bibl.seg: DANIEL Robert W. and Franco MALTOMINI (edited with translations and notes by), Supplementum Magicum. Vol. I (Suppl. Mag. I). (Papyrologica Coloniensia. XVI, 1.)
Opladen, Westdeutscher Verlag, 1990, 8Â°, xxvi-213 pp. et 8 pll. DM 98.
Supplement to P.G.M. - Protective Charms, Pagan (1-19), Christian (20-36). - Erotic Charms (37-51). - The texts have all been published previously. Except for Latin 36, they are Greek.

C.R. par Ken Dowden, CR N.S., 46 (1996) p. 176. - Marco Fantuzzi, RivFil 119 (1991) pp. 79-86. - Christine Harrauer, WS 104 (1991) p. 289. - Christian Onasch, ArchPF 38 (1992) pp. 71-72. - William M. Brashear, CP 91 (1996) pp. 373-375.
